Text.Page:
Allemantheia will never be safe until Akasha lies dead.

Get to Akasha's Chamber and slay the goddess!
The Goddess of Epidemics met her end at your hands. Only Thulsa remained. However, he didn't seem to want to attract any attention. Thanks to your deeds, peace returned to Allemantheia.
Incredible! All the cross-continent chasing...all the near misses...they all weakened her just enough that you could deliver some mortal justice!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What about Thulsa?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Thulsa's still out there somewhere, scheming in the shadows, and the argons keep marching on Kaiator, but those are problems for another day. Savor this moment, <PCNAME>. Your skill and courage changed the course of history. Our shared battles are perhaps the greatest honor my career has afforded. For Valkyon!
